name: risk.
description:
Follow the story of Amara, a teenager who wishes to pursue a career in music composition and production. Through the obstacles she faces on her journey, she finds herself in new situations (some good, some bad) and realises the importance of taking risks. 

Created by Saisha Kartik for the MYP Personal Project

Characters: Minh Khue Truong (find on almost every social media platform as @lolmeurp)

Music: Sourced from Epidemic Sound

Backgrounds: Unsplash Contributors
